all in sunder -> and : 1
in sunder and -> from : 1
sunder and from -> the : 1
from the horns -> of : 1
the horns of -> lord : 1
horns of lord -> safely : 1
of lord safely -> you : 1
lord safely you -> pamela : 1
safely you pamela -> splendid : 1
you pamela splendid -> notably : 1
pamela splendid notably -> whim : 1
splendid notably whim -> of : 1
notably whim of -> the : 1
whim of the -> and : 1
the and dubious -> verse : 1
and dubious verse -> bears : 1
dubious verse bears -> a : 1
verse bears a -> via : 1
bears a via -> the : 1
a via the -> tastes : 1
via the tastes -> of : 1
the tastes of -> the : 1
tastes of the -> unicorns : 1
of the unicorns -> of : 1
the unicorns of -> the : 1
unicorns of the -> secret : 1
of the secret -> to : 1
the secret to -> the : 1
secret to the -> text : 1
to the text -> of : 1
the text of -> the : 1
text of the -> twenty : 1
of the twenty -> second : 1
the twenty second -> psalm : 1
twenty second psalm -> as : 1
second psalm as -> found : 1
psalm as found -> in : 1
as found in -> john : 1
found in john -> with : 1
